mapper.select: SELECT lno, m_id, like_cd, like_li FROM member_like WHERE m_id=#{s_m_id} ORDER BY like_cd DESC
select lno, m_id, like_cd, like_li, CC.edit from member_like MM join concert CC on MM.like_li=CC.c_no where m_id=#{s_m_id} and like_cd='C'
select lno, m_id, like_cd, like_li, PP.edit from member_like MM join product PP on MM.like_li=PP.pro_no where m_id=#{s_m_id} and like_cd='P'
